model.name: PDCA Template Version Consistency & Achievement-Focused Development
model.description: PDCA template version inconsistency between template.md (3.1.4.2) and howto.PDCA.md (3.1) creates confusion. TRON emphasizes achievement over punishment - want to achieve, not punish failures. Development should focus on progress and success rather than failure measurement.
model.rationale: Template version confusion prevents clear compliance guidance. TRON's philosophy of achievement over punishment should guide development approach - focus on success and progress rather than failure analysis and punishment.
acceptance_criteria: Single authoritative PDCA template version across all documentation
Clear template version specification in all PDCA guidelines
Punishment-based failure measurement eliminated from process
Progress and success metrics prioritized over failure tracking
model.implementation_notes: Resolve template version confusion and establish achievement-focused development culture that emphasizes progress and success over failure punishment.
